Detailed Description

cvmx_ase_ecc_ctl

This register can be used to disable ECC checks, insert ECC errors.

Fields *ECC_DIS disable SBE detection/correction and DBE detection. If ECC_DIS is 0x1, then no errors are detected.

Fields *ECC_FLIP_SYND flip the syndrome<1:0> bits to generate 1-bit/2-bits error for testing. _ 0x0 = normal operation. _ 0x1 = SBE on bit<0>. _ 0x2 = SBE on bit<1>. _ 0x3 = DBE on bit<1:0>.
